title: Tensher Wolves
description: The Travellers encounter Tensher wolves, the apex predators of Walston's wilderness. How they handle this defines their approach to the frontier.

creature_stats.name: Tensher Wolf
creature_stats.danger_level: Moderate - will attack if provoked or cornered

avoidance.result: Detect wolves early, route around territory

combat.note: Possible but messy, may attract more
combat.consequence: Dead wolves, injured PCs, delayed progress

escalation.peaceful: Wolves observe from distance, do not attack
escalation.tense: Wolves approach, test boundaries, may be driven off

environmental_factors: Rocky terrain provides cover but limits vehicle movement
Time of day affects wolf activity

roleplay_guidance.frontier_tone: This is wild country. Nature doesn't care about your schedule.
roleplay_guidance.reward_creativity: Multiple solutions work - players shouldn't feel forced into combat
